title: Perma ban with no warning for over 6 months?
body: Hi, I've already spoke to riot support and it was already established that I'm not getting unbanned so this is not what this post is about. I've been playing League since 2013 and was banned 2 months ago (roughly). From the time from my account being created to my account being banned, I've had plenty of off games which resulted in me being banned permanently. My last warning which was a (15 game?) chat restriction was given to me roughly 6 months prior to me getting banned which I think is stupid. Yes I had one bad game in a few months which yes was ranked and yes I did feed and I do get that I should've been punished for that but a perma ban? Come on riot, I thought you were better than that, at least give people a cool down period because the ban hit me hard. To think that all the money and time i spent playing. Anyway, just thought I'd put my 2 cents in.

replies.body: Usually to jump punishment teirs you either need to be scripting which is an instant perma or hit one of the special triggers around super toxic stuff like telling people to kill them selves
I only have the chatlog of one game whenever I try to login and no mentioned of kys anywhere, when I spoke to riot they also had no mention of that either. Also wasn't scripting either.

That's not the only one. It's just the one that tends to come up. 

If you want to you can post you chat logs and people what point out what most likely resulted in you skipping a punishment their
if I was to post the chatlog I'd be banned on the boards. They are pretty bad and I know that but the point im trying to make is that 1 bad game in 6 months shouldnt be able to get me banned.

If you haven't had any temp bans before it must have been one hell of a bad game to result in a perma ban. 

The way it usually works is two chat bans, temp ban and then perma ban. You go down teirs if you behave for a good amount of time.
After reviewing my chatlog the Worst I said was along the lines of "Autistic F*ggot" and constant "report nid" (I was nid). Other than that its just "i'm feeding come meet at baron etc."

Hate speech is a big nono, same as telling people to kill themselves. If you were saying things like you describe I'm not surprised you got jumped to the perma, and that's not even considering the fact that you were intent feeding as well.

You only drop tiers if you are demonstrating neutral or positive behaviour, so if you are still being negative, but not to the point of a punishment, you are effectively waiving that.

If you want us to highlight all of what got you banned, then you are more than welcome to post your logs here, but from what you have said, the ban was deserved.

I get it, I'd just like another chance is all. Afterall its only a f2p game that I decided to spend money on, from what I know I am allowed to make an alt so I may as well considering its my best option. Thanks though. Just wish they had made things more clearer as to what was allowed / not allowed.

It should have been made very clear when you got your first two punishments that such behaviour wasn't allowed. Given you didn't get escalated until now, I assume your previous behaviour was not as bad, and yet you got punished for it, which should have made it very obvious that behaviour to this extent would be met with harsher punishment.

>Afterall its only a f2p game that I decided to spend money on

If you don't respect the game, you don't deserve to play.

you spent money on it... good for you. you made your choices now live with them.. That's called accountability.
